findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Division of decimal numbers can result in rounding errors due to Solidity implementation.

findings.title: MTS - Misleading Total Supply
findings.description: The `totalSupply()` function returns the total supply minus the amount moved to the dead address, which may produce misleading results.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized only in the constructor can be declared as immutable for optimization and gas efficiency.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant to ensure they cannot be changed by any function in the contract.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow Solidity naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is present in the contract, which can create clutter and increase deployment cost.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using uninitialized local variables can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.
